Polisi yang Pukul Sopir Ambulans di Sumut Dinonaktifkan
02 Nov 2019, 21:45 by Audrey Santoso
Jakarta - Viral di media sosial video cekcok antara seorang oknum polisi di Tebing Tinggi, Sumatera Utara (Sumut) dengan sopir ambulans yang sedang membawa pasien. Oknum polisi tersebut telah dinonaktifkan dari tugasnya usai kejadian.
"Terhadap oknum anggota tersebut, untuk saat ini yang bersangkutan dinonaktifkan dari tugasnya," kata Kapolres Tebing Tinggi AKBP Sunadi kepada detikcom, Sabtu (2/11/2019).
Sunadi menuturkan pihaknya telah memeriksa oknum polisi berinisial Brigadir UMP dan keterangannya dituangkan dalam berita acara pemeriksaan (BAP). Selanjutnya, Brigadir UMP akan menjalani sidang disiplin.
"Kita lengkapi BAP, baru kemudian disidangkan. Sidang disiplin," ucap Sunadi.

The Police Who Hit the Ambulance Driver in North Sumatra Disabled
02 Nov 2019, 21:45 by Audrey Santoso
Jakarta - Viral on social media video bicker between a police officer in Tebing Tinggi, North Sumatra (North Sumatra) with an ambulance driver carrying a patient. The police officers have been deactivated from their duties after the incident.
"Regarding the individual members, for the time being concerned is deactivated from his duties," Tebing Tinggi Police Chief Sunadi AKBP told AFP on Saturday (11/02/2019).
Sunadi said that his party had checked the police with the initials Brigadier UMP and his statement was outlined in the minutes of the examination (BAP). Furthermore, Brigadier UMP will undergo a disciplinary hearing.
"We complete the BAP, then proceed to trial. The disciplinary hearing," said Sunadi.
